text: She's the head of a billion - dollar - per - year fashion label. But Jessica Simpson was on mommy duty as she celebrated her five - year - old daughter Maxwell's first day of kindergarten on Thursday. The singer - turned - designer, 37, proudly posted an Instagram snap of her mini - me little one all dressed up in her adorable school uniform. What a cutie!
